title: THeWildking
author: THeWildking
content: BOUNTY IS NOW LIVE1. Bounty Campaign Starts on: 10 October - 06 November (4 weeks)2. 25,000 QIE coins will be distributed within 1 month after the bounty is over.3. Complete tasks and make reports every week in this thread! 4. Connect with Hovr in social media;- Twitter: https://twitter.com/HovrSite- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hovr.site/- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hovr.site/- Telegram: https://t.me/HovRonQiblockchain- Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/hovrNFT/- Learn more about  Hovr:  https://hovr.site/5. Tokens will be distributed depending on the quality of your work.6. Spammers, cheaters, bots, and similar participants will be banned immediately!7. Follow all the bounty groups/channels to get support and to stay updated;- Bounty Group:  https://t.me/hovrbountyNote:If you are disqualified for any reason, you will NOT receive any rewards.All rights reserved by  and the Hovr team. We can make any changes to the campaign rules, if applicable.By joining these campaigns, you're accepting these above terms.Code: ~Proof of authentication;Telegram username:Campaigns applied:QI wallet address [Do not Use Trust wallet]25,000 QIE coins will be distributed in this campaign. Only participants with quality work(s) will be rewarded;- Twitter Campaign: 30%- Content Campaign: 20%- Reserved: 10%Note:Only 500 participants will be accepted in Twitter Camping                           •Twitter Camping•Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Have at least 300 followers to participate.2. Must follow Hovr Twitter account: @HovrSite3. Make 1 post and 1 repost, per day. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.4. Minimum of 10 posts per week (5 tweets, 5 retweets)5. Twitter accounts will be audited, only those with real followers will be accepted!6. Use these hashtags; #HovR #HovRHooligans #NFTMarketplace #NFT #foxcampaigns #qie #qiblockchain                           Google Fromhttps://forms.gle/HEqRFHW3HE1A1bDR6                            Spreadsheet https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1LT-GRJfKEseCuS89aFEx-TFxQ8U6iEN0ZOkU7G7hju0/edit?usp=sharing
